EmailTemplate.name: SEVT-202305-HHS-ENT-AONL-CONF.00d. Invite 2_Series#2
EmailTemplate.subject: Discover virtual nursing at AONL 2023
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Increase efficiency and staff satisfaction with inpatient virtual care AONL 2023
May 1-4
Anaheim Convention Center Why inpatient virtual nursing? Faster response times. Decreased length of stay. Increased staff satisfaction. If you or a colleague are attending AONL 2023, let's connect about the power of virtual nursing. • Meet us at Booth #467 <[[https://calendly.com/teladochealth-marketingevents/aonl-2023?month=2023-05]]> to learn how our virtual nursing solution is addressing staff challenges while increasing nurse satisfaction • Learn from our partners—including Providence, Saint Luke’s Health System and Trinity Health— on May 3 at 7 a.m. PT to hear how they’ve successfully implemented virtual nursing programs • Get a head start on the conversation by exploring these resources <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/virtual-nursing/]]> About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Road, Purchase NY, 10577.
